faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is an AI image generator and how does it work?
items.description: An AI image generator uses advanced machine learning models (like GPT-4o) to create images from text descriptions. Simply describe what you want to see, and the AI interprets your words to generate a unique image matching your vision.

items.title: Can I use the generated images commercially?
items.description: Yes! All images you generate have full commercial usage rights. You can use them in your projects, products, marketing materials, or anywhere else without restrictions.

items.title: What image styles are available?
items.description: We support dozens of styles including anime, photorealistic, 3D render, oil painting, watercolor, sketch, pixel art, and many more. You can also mix styles or create custom variations to match your exact needs.

items.title: How long does it take to generate an image?
items.description: Most images are generated in 5-15 seconds depending on complexity and resolution. Batch generations are processed in parallel, so creating multiple images doesn't take significantly longer.

items.title: What image resolution can I get?
items.description: You can generate images up to 4K resolution (4096x4096 pixels), perfect for printing, high-quality displays, and professional use. Standard generations start at 1024x1024 pixels.

items.title: Do I need design skills to use this?
items.description: Not at all! Our AI is designed to be intuitive for everyone. Just describe what you want in plain English, and the AI handles the rest. The more detailed your description, the better the results, but you can start simple.
